website_summaries.verdict: For fans of horror in the gaming genre, this title delivers with plenty of disturbing moments alongside the thrill of the various gaming situations and action scenes.
pros: Creative creatures and backgrounds will keep you entertained
Builds nicely on the original title, extending the franchise with an interesting new storyline
cons: Scares and horror scenes lose their luster after a few plays

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game, and a massive improvement over the first. Couple things with this disc version. The full game IS NOT included on disc. You must register the code to a Steam account (included in the case) and, if you choose, install a portion of the game from the disc or fully install it from Steam. Makes no difference which way you do it. The game is marked up to $40, so buying it cheap physical may be a better option in some cases. Or just wait til its on sale.
customer_reviews.author: OldThings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition and the product key worked too
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked LNIB and no problems getting the game up and running (the disc was primo and everything looked untouched inside the case). I had a previous Steam account so maybe I got lucky in that regard getting it loaded and running. The reCaptcha kept giving me grief until I closed out all that nonsense and used my old login info on Steam.

product_meta.title: The Evil Within 2 - PC
product_meta.description: Platform:PC| Edition:StandardFrom Shinji Mikami, The Evil Within 2 takes the acclaimed franchise to a new level with its unique blend of psychological thrills and true survival horror. Sebastian Castellanos has lost everything, including his daughter, Lily. To save her, he's forced to partner with Mobius, the shadowy group responsible for the destruction of his former life. For his last chance at redemption, the only way out is in.
feature_bullets: Story of Redemption: Return to the nightmare to win back your life and your daughter
Discover Horrifying Domains : Explore as far or quickly as you dare, but prepare wisely
Face Disturbing Enemies : Survive encounters with sadistic enemies and twisted creatures
Choose How to Survive : Attack from the shadows, run like hell, or go in guns blazing with very limited ammo
Visceral Horror and Suspense: Enter a world filled with anxiety-inducing thrills and disturbing moments
